name: .CBA File Extension
summary: Learn about .CBA files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Digital comic book compressed with ACE compression (.ACE files); contains a collection of images that represent pages in the comic book; used for distributing comic books and reading them with supporting e-readers.

content: The CBA format is much less common than the .CBR, .CBZ, and .CB7 formats, which use more popular forms of compression (.RAR, .ZIP, and .7Z).

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
